alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:21PM CDT until June 11 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Central Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walterhill, or near Murfreesboro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smithville, Smyrna, Walterhill, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Lascassas, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 68 and 82. Interstate 840 between mile markers 48 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
